snippet: Mo'Ne Davis's Taney Youth Baseball Association team won its Mid-Atlantic regional semifinal on Friday, but Kayla Roncin's Toms River team lost.
abstract: Pitcher Mo’Ne Davis and her Philadelphia Little League team defeat Colonie, NY, team, 6-5, to advance to Little League World Series finals, making Davis the only girl to reach 2014 Little League World Series.
lead_paragraph: Mo'Ne Davis's Taney Youth Baseball Association team won its Mid-Atlantic regional semifinal on Friday, but Kayla Roncin's Toms River team lost.

headline.main: Little League Region Final Will Involve Only One Girl
headline.print_headline: Little League Region Final Will Involve Only One Girl
